# jsdoc/require-property-type

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Requires that each `@property` tag has a type value (within curly brackets).

### Why is this bad?

The type of a property should be documented.

### Example

```javascript
// Passing
/**
 * @typedef {SomeType} SomeTypedef
 * @property {number} foo
 */

// Failing
/**
 * @typedef {SomeType} SomeTypedef
 * @property foo
 */
```
